summary:
BNBDragonTiger - BNBDragonTiger is a new NFT and P2Earn project that allows users to own and trade unique digital assets while earning passive income through staking and farming. The platform also offers community-driven governance and a deflationary token economy.

 Why choose us? - Liquidity is locked, which means that there is no chance of a rugpull. The BNBDragonTiger smart contract was written in Solidity 0.8.18 version. The contract has been verified. BNBDragonTiger is following a marketing strategy to promote the project to the whole world. The team is made up of an experienced group with a strong BSC development and marketing background.

 BNBDragonTiger Roadmap - Phase 01: Stealth Launch, Create Socials, Website Live, Ave Listing, Dextools Uptade, Marketing Tier-1. Phase 02: Youtube marketing Tier - 1, Different country communities, Turkish Youtube marketing Tier - 1, CMC And Cg Applied, Chinese Marketing Tier - 1, Staking Live, Website v2 launch. Phase 03: Turkish Influencers Marketing, BNBDragonTiger NFTs Mint, BNBDragonTiger Nft Dapp, Chinese Marketing Tier - 2, Cex Listing, Marketing Tier - 2, Binance AMA, P2Earn Game Live. Phase 04: Crypto Influencers AMA, BNBDragonTiger Swap, Marketing Tier - 3, Listing our P2Earn App on GooglePlay and AppStore, Chinese Marketing Tier - 3, 20.000 Holders, Top Cex Listing.
